titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate on Wednesday, May 25, 1994, Thursday, May 26, 1994, Friday, May 27, 1994, or Saturday, May 28, 1994, until Tuesday, June 7, 1994, and a conditional adjournment of the House on Thursday, May 26, 1994, until Wednesday, June 8, 1994.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/25/1994--Introduced. Provides for a recess or an adjournment of the Senate on May 25, 26, 27, or 28, 1994, until June 7, 1994, and an adjournment of the House of Representatives on May 26 until June 8, 1994.
